item.title: Welcome
item.author: Anthony D Simmons
item.description: Welcome to the Ghost Engine. A space for learning and growing. A space where I talked about my quest of becoming a better programming and learning from tech founders. This is the space where I reflect and exmaine everything from coding to what tech founders have learned.
